evidence.text: Person A: My poor daughter gets them. Has to sleep with me now. In my dreams I fly, I make love. Why should she suffer? Try listening to music in bed. The lute - that helps I hear. That particular timbre - maybe the lap steel or the lute, but I don’t know, look it up. What’s this...peculiar sense of taste?

Person B: Yeah.
Person A: You eat a lot of treats?
